title: Clay Letter to Madison - Identify Purpose

content.prompt: Clay most likely wrote the letter in support of which of the following?

choices.label: Granting financial support to Latin American countries to protect United States interests
Regulating agreements made between workers and factory owners
Enacting a tariff on goods entering the United States
Directing government subsidies to farmers to boost agricultural production

topic.text: 4.2: The Rise of Political Parties and the Era of Jefferson

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
